name: Lead
summary: Lead (/l…õd/) is a chemical element in the carbon group with symbol Pb (from Latin:plumbum) and atomic number 82. Lead is a soft, malleable and heavy post-transition metal. Metallic lead has a bluish-white color after being freshly cut, but it soon tarnishes to a dull grayish color when exposed to air.

image.title: Ultrapure Lead Bead from two sides. Original size in cm: 1.5 x 2
